page.title: 07BLAGDON, MY HOME VILLAGE
page.content: In our village lots of events are organised,like fetes.We hold the {Donkey Derby}each year,and we have church fetes and Blagdon School fete.There are lots of clubs for children in Blagdon like{guides, {brownies,and youth club.}We have a few shops like the post office, the shop, butcher and a hairdresser and we used to have an old shoe shop which has closed down now,and we have two Estate agents.In our village we have a fire station and we used to have a police station we also have a hotel which is on the Mendips,there is also a small garage. Most school children live here in the village, but some come by bus or taxi, or in their parents' cars. We love all the extra activities the teachers and parents organise for us at school. We perform musicals and plays for parents and other friends.
